entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
